There are many advantages to such businesses. You do not need to manage employees or inventory of good, and you can run this kind of a business from your home, and the potential revenue is great. In this article you will get ideas on how you can make money online in a number of ways, and give you plenty of tips and insider know-how!

You do not need a fancy site with complicated functionality. You can begin with as little as a blog that you can set up in less than a day, and for free. Of course, to really create a big business, you will need something professional, but it if you want to get started quickly, you can begin making money with just a blog. 2) STEP TWO: REGISTER AS AN AFFILIATE OR FOR ADSENSE (20 MINUTES AND FREE)

If you want to make money by displaying ads on your site, you can register for Google AdSense at google.com/adsense


And to become an affiliate reseller of goods, you can register to become an affiliate reseller at amazon.com clickbank.com cj.com (sommission junction) or any number of other affiliate sites. Once you have an account there, you will be given a URL to place on your site. Whenever you create a new page or a blog post on your blog/website, just place these links where that is appropriate. And when the user goes on to buy something, you will get a commission of the sale. The commission depends on the product you will be selling.


You can set up both ads and your affiliate accounts. It is free, and we will show you how to take advantage of both of these in the upcoming sections of this article.

You can begin promoting your blog on social media, SEO (Search Engine Optimization), with YouTube videos, by answering questions on Quora (links from Quora will drive traffic to your site and your YouTube channel), and much more.

Just as you will be promoting your products and serving ads from your website, you can do the same from videos you post on YouTube. You can maintain your own channel which will serve as an extra way for you to advertise your website AND an extra way you can directly make money.
You can take videos from your computer or phone. But try to have the videos be as high quality as possible.
